description: Retrieves a list of aggregated finding statistics for an external access or unused access analyzer.

parameters.name: analyzerArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the analyzer used to generate the statistics.

nested_items.name: findingsStatistics
nested_items.description: A group of external access or unused access findings statistics.

nested_items.name: externalAccessFindingsStatistics
nested_items.description: The aggregate statistics for an external access analyzer.

nested_items.name: resourceTypeStatistics
nested_items.description: The total number of active cross-account and public findings for each resource type of the specified external access analyzer.

nested_items.name: totalActivePublic
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: totalActivePublic
nested_items.description: The total number of active public findings for the resource type.

nested_items.name: totalActiveCrossAccount
nested_items.description: The total number of active cross-account findings for the resource type.

nested_items.name: totalActiveFindings
nested_items.description: The number of active findings for the specified external access analyzer.

nested_items.name: totalArchivedFindings
nested_items.description: The number of archived findings for the specified external access analyzer.

nested_items.name: totalResolvedFindings
nested_items.description: The number of resolved findings for the specified external access analyzer.

nested_items.name: unusedAccessFindingsStatistics
nested_items.description: The aggregate statistics for an unused access analyzer.

nested_items.name: unusedAccessTypeStatistics
nested_items.description: A list of details about the total number of findings for each type of unused access for the analyzer.

nested_items.name: unusedAccessType
nested_items.description: The type of unused access.

nested_items.name: total
nested_items.description: The total number of findings for the specified unused access type.

nested_items.name: topAccounts
nested_items.description: A list of one to ten Amazon Web Services accounts that have the most active findings for the unused access analyzer.

nested_items.name: account
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account for which unused access finding details are provided.

nested_items.name: numberOfActiveFindings
nested_items.description: The number of active unused access findings for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: totalActiveFindings
nested_items.description: The total number of active findings for the unused access analyzer.

nested_items.name: totalArchivedFindings
nested_items.description: The total number of archived findings for the unused access analyzer.

nested_items.name: totalResolvedFindings
nested_items.description: The total number of resolved findings for the unused access analyzer.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the retrieval of the findings statistics was last updated. If the findings statistics have not been previously retrieved for the specified analyzer, this field will not be populated.
